author: holiman
content: Good question! I would suspect that it's as you guess, no or incorrect pre-warmup when executing statetests. Will look into it

author: holiman

author: _shemnon
content: I'll try and get a set of state tests from the existing state tests so we can start plugging these through our fuzzing tools and get traces.
